content: for bor *k1 p1* for 1 1 25 change to larger needles next round *p3 k6 p1 k6 p3 k2 p1 k2* begin working main pattern using main chart or main written pattern w cid 82 cid 85 cid 78 r cid 82 cid 88 cid 81 d cid 86 1-6 a cid 87 cid 82 cid 87 a cid 79 ​ cid 82 f cid 86 cid 76 cid 91 e cid 76 gh cid 87 cid 87 cid 76 cid 80 e cid 86 next round *p3 k6 p1 k6 p3 k2 p1 k2* change to smaller needles *k1 p1* for 1 1 25 proceed to finishing instructions w cid 325 cid 316 cid 327 cid 327 e cid 321 pa cid 327 cid 327 e cid 325 cid 321 cid 1003 main cid 1002 r cid 82 cid 88 cid 81 cid 71 cid 86 1 3 *p3 k6 p1 k6 p3 c2f p1 c2b* ​ r cid 82 cid 88 cid 81 cid 71 cid 86 2 4 6 *p3 k6 p1 k6 p3 k2 p1 k2* ​ r cid 82 cid 88 cid 81 cid 71 5 *p3 c6b p1 c6f p3 c2f p1 c2b* ​ c cid 315 a cid 325 cid 327 ed pa cid 327 cid 327 e cid 325 cid 321 cid 782 eac cid 315 cid 325 cid 322 cid 328 cid 321 d cid 325 ead cid 325 cid 316 cid 314 cid 315 cid 327 cid 327 cid 322 cid 319 ef cid 327 cid 783 cid 1003 cid 1003 f cid 316 cid 321 cid 316 cid 326 cid 315 cid 316 cid 321 cid 314 cid 1003 bobble loosely with preferred method sample finished using a tubular bind-off weave in all ends block according to your yarn cid 182 s washing instructions to achieve desired fit m cid 316 cid 326 c cid 747 cid 1003 every effort has been made to ensure accuracy in this pattern but if you have questions or comments please reach out to me @lochknits on ravelry or instagram cid 178 i cid 182 d love to hear from you happ cid 92 kni cid 87 cid 87 ing cid 178 ha cid 92 le cid 92
